item.title: Project 1: Google Play Store 2018 Category Analysis
item.description: Background Google Play Store consists of numerous applications within varying categories. The digital distribution service for Android grants users access to millions of apps, in a number of categories, including many family, gaming, and tool, to name a few. There were approximately 2.7 million applications available as of February 2017. The scraped Kaggle data reveals the state of the Google Play Store as of 2018. The dataset highlights 33 categories in the Google Play Store that developers can explore for potential business growth.
